entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:57 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
